Description: Bronze incense-tongs inscribed on one surface with a Demotic inscription; the terminals are in the form of hands.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Prof Walter B Emery
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Saqqara (Memphis), H5-2501 From sector 3, falcon gallery 16, cache 9
Curator's comments: Insley-Green, Temple Furniture (1987): 44, fig.67 S. Davies and H.S. Smith, The sacred animal necropolis at North Saqqara, MEES 73, 2005, p. 113 D. Antoine and M. Vandenbeusch, Egyptian mummies. Exploring ancient lives, Sydney 2016, pp. 94-5.
Bibliographic references: Insley Green 1987 / The temple furniture from the sacred animal necropolis at North Saqqara, 1964-1976 (94)
